column2: "It's ARKS' number one information dealers, Patty n' Tea! Older sister Patty here!"
"ARKS' number one information dealers, Patty n' Tea. It's me, Tea the younger sister."
"We've got a question for you! Are you going to save Matoi? Or are you just going to give up?"
"If you're going to give up, then we don't have anything to say to you! Go home and put your feet up!"
"But if you're planning to save her, stick around and listen to us!"

"Supposedly, they're still searching for Matoi's location.
...But in reality, they already know where she is."
"We weren't able to get an exact location, but it seems that Xiao found out where she is ages ago!"
"However, he apparently hasn't found a way to rescue her yet. Could that be why everyone's keeping quiet about it?"
"...Hmm, it's likely that Xiao already has at least one solution figured out."
"But it's a solution he refuses to accept, so he's put everything on hold while he searches for another way."
"...Xiao's desperate. He's so focused on this one thing that he's letting information leak all over the place."
"Desperately working alone, trying to find any other way..."
"But we're not just gonna let him hide himself away and work in secret! Nuh-uh! No way! Not happening!"
"Information wants to be free, and we won't allow anyone to lock it up, no matter what. Because we're..."
"ARKS' number one information dealers! Patty n' Tea!"
"By the way, do you remember? Patty n' Tea has a rarely-seen third member!"
"She's missing right now, and we'll be in trouble if she doesn't come back..."

"You still owe us from all the information we've given you.
...So this is how you're gonna repay us. Save her!"
"Of course, there's a reward in it for you as well."
"A big one! You'll get free information from Patty n' Tea for the rest of your life!"
"Think about it."
